title: Apple Purchase Data Pipeline
text: This project showcases a modular ETL pipeline built with PySpark on Databricks, designed to analyze customer purchase behavior.

title: Zoho SalesIQ Insights Pipeline
text: An end-to-end system that ingests chat engagement data from the AI-powered Zobot, transforms and stores it in the Cloud for analytics, and powers live dashboards and machine learning insights.

title: AI Support Website
text: This project is a prototype for a modern customer support experience, blending a personal portfolio with an intelligent assistant powered by OpenAI.

title: Weather Data Analysis
text: This project includes three main modules: data ingestion, field data processing, and weather data processing for statistical analyses, along with Pytests for validation.
